mbean.name: sipana:type=Service,name=SipanaProperties
mbean.attribute: sipana.sip.status.initiated = STARTED sipana.sip.status.initiated = PROVISIONED sipana.sip.status.established = ESTABLISHED sipana.sip.status.completed = COMPLETED sipana.sip.status.failed = FAILED sipana.sip.status.timeout = TIMEOUT sipana.sip.status.unknown = UNKNOWN
